Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticatedController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements AuthenticatedController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the add or modify Appointment form.

    • onActionSaveAppointment

      void onActionSaveAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Save this new or modified Appointment.

      Updates existing appointment, or adds new appointment to database.

      A lambda is used to filter out the current appointment we are editing when checking for overlapping appointments. The collections method removeIf is a much cleaner, more concise way of filtering without using if statements nested in for or while loops. The removeIf method requires a predicate, and so provide a lambda as an anonymous function (in this case a one-line statement).

      Parameters:
      event - the user generated event (a button being clicked) that caused this to execute
